name: Machine Dream
description:
the power of magnetism is stronger the closer they are together. use your magnet head to pull yourself out of the darkness.

controls:
WASD/arrows for movement
Spacebar (or X) to jump / leap off walls
Z (or M) to use magnet

credits:
all animation, art, design, code by pipotchi (me)
all sounds and music custom made by subjectloser (https://soundcloud.com/subject-loser)

this was made for the Brackeys Game Jam with the theme Stronger Together. I got the idea for magnets being stronger together pretty late and it was a mad rush to pull everything together in 5 days. Thanks for checking out the game and please let me know what you think of it!
